about_the_game:
Telltale Games invites you to visit an alternate version of the classic Jane Austen novel in Pride and Prejudice: Blood Ties!

Recently some odd, dark rumors surround Rosings Park, Lady Catherine’s grand estate. But things get serious when you get a letter from your beloved Mr. Darcy saying that your younger sister Lydia is missing and was last seen at Rosings! What’s more, your beloved has broken up with you and forbids you to visit! Are you strong enough to fight for your love and your missing sister? You’ll need courage and heart to save the day in this eerie version of the classic love story turned Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

Features
Fantasy retelling of the classic Jane Austen novel.
Search through Rosings across 30+ eerie locations
Play 40+ hidden object puzzle scenarios!
Rack your brain with 20+ puzzling minigames!
Then re-visit new areas of Rosings in a new tale for the Bonus Chapter!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version.

The Collector’s Edition includes:

Revisit Rosings Park in a second tale where you once again pit your wits against your adversary to save your beloved!
Bonus scenes, mini-games, and puzzles!
Tons of collectibles and morphing objects to find!
Downloadable wallpapers and music tracks!

Telltale Games invites you to visit an alternate version of the classic Jane Austen novel in Pride and Prejudice: Blood Ties!

Recently some odd, dark rumors surround Rosings Park, Lady Catherine’s grand estate. But things get serious when you get a letter from your beloved Mr. Darcy saying that your younger sister Lydia is missing and was last seen at Rosings! What’s more, your beloved has broken up with you and forbids you to visit! Are you strong enough to fight for your love and your missing sister? You’ll need courage and heart to save the day in this eerie version of the classic love story turned Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

Features
Fantasy retelling of the classic Jane Austen novel.
Search through Rosings across 30+ eerie locations
Play 40+ hidden object puzzle scenarios!
Rack your brain with 20+ puzzling minigames!
Then re-visit new areas of Rosings in a new tale for the Bonus Chapter!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version.

The Collector’s Edition includes:

Revisit Rosings Park in a second tale where you once again pit your wits against your adversary to save your beloved!

Tons of collectibles and morphing objects to find!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10, El Capitan and up
  • Processor: Core i5 1.4G or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1.4G
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 12, Catalina and up
  • Processor: Core i5 2.5G or higher
  • Graphics: 2.5G
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: What is going on at Rosings Park!? When your sister Lydia goes missing and Mr Darcy forbids you to come see him at Rosings Park, that is EXACTLY where you are going!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
